description: Nginx access log analytics dashboard using Promtail and Loki v2+. Prometheus datasource is created from Loki service.

targets.expr: count(sum by (remote_addr) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host=~"$host"} | json | http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*" | http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*" | remote_addr !~ "2001:4ca0:108:42::*" | remote_addr !="62.210.149.41" | remote_addr !~ "91.134.156.*" | remote_addr !~ "37.59.149.*" | http_user_agent != "worldping-api" | request_uri !~ "/wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "//wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "/*.wordfence.*" | request_uri !~ "/robots.txt" | request_uri !~ "/xmlrpc.php" |  __error__="" [1h])))

count(sum by (remote_addr) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host=~"$host"} | json | http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*" | http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*" | remote_addr !~ "2001:4ca0:108:42::*" | remote_addr !="62.210.149.41" | remote_addr !~ "91.134.156.*" | remote_addr !~ "37.59.149.*" | http_user_agent != "worldping-api" | request_uri !~ "/wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "//wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "/*.wordfence.*" | request_uri !~ "/robots.txt" | request_uri !~ "/xmlrpc.php" |  __error__="" [24h])))

count(sum by (remote_addr) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host=~"$host"} | json | http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*" | http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*" | remote_addr !~ "2001:4ca0:108:42::*" | remote_addr !="62.210.149.41" | remote_addr !~ "91.134.156.*" | remote_addr !~ "37.59.149.*" | http_user_agent != "worldping-api" | request_uri !~ "/wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "//wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "/*.wordfence.*" | request_uri !~ "/robots.txt" | request_uri !~ "/xmlrpc.php" |  __error__="" [2d])))

count(sum by (remote_addr) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host=~"$host"} | json | http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*" | http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*" | remote_addr !~ "2001:4ca0:108:42::*" | remote_addr !="62.210.149.41" | remote_addr !~ "91.134.156.*" | remote_addr !~ "37.59.149.*" | http_user_agent != "worldping-api" | request_uri !~ "/wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "//wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "/*.wordfence.*" | request_uri !~ "/robots.txt" | request_uri !~ "/xmlrpc.php" |  __error__="" [7d])))

sum by (geoip_country_code) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host=~"$host"} | json | http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*" | http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*" | remote_addr !~ "2001:4ca0:108:42::*" | remote_addr !="62.210.149.41" | remote_addr !~ "91.134.156.*" | remote_addr !~ "37.59.149.*" | http_user_agent != "worldping-api" | request_uri !~ "/wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "//wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "/*.wordfence.*" | request_uri !~ "/robots.txt" | request_uri !~ "/xmlrpc.php" | __error__="" [$__interval]))
count_over_time({filename="/var/log/nginx/access.json.log", host=~"$host"} [1m])

count(sum by (remote_addr) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host=~"$host"} | json | http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*" | http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*" | remote_addr !~ "2001:4ca0:108:42::*" | remote_addr !="62.210.149.41" | remote_addr !~ "91.134.156.*" | remote_addr !~ "37.59.149.*" | http_user_agent != "worldping-api" | request_uri !~ "/wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "//wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "/*.wordfence.*" | request_uri !~ "/robots.txt" | request_uri !~ "/xmlrpc.php" |  __error__="" [1d])))

topk(5, sum by (remote_addr) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host=~"$host"} | json | http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*" | http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*" | remote_addr !~ "2001:4ca0:108:42::*" | remote_addr !="62.210.149.41" | remote_addr !~ "91.134.156.*" | remote_addr !~ "37.59.149.*" | http_user_agent != "worldping-api" | request_uri !~ "/wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "//wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "/*.wordfence.*" | request_uri !~ "/robots.txt" | request_uri !~ "/xmlrpc.php" |  __error__="" [$__interval])))
topk(10, sum by (http_host) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host=~"$host"} | json | http_referer != "" | __error__="" [$__interval])))

topk(10,sum by (request_uri) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host=~"$host"} | json | http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*" | http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*" | request_uri != "/" | request_uri !~ "/wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "//wp-.*" | request_uri !~ "/*.wordfence.*" | request_uri !~ "/robots.txt" | request_uri !~ "/xmlrpc.php" | __error__="" [$__interval])))
topk(50, sum by (http_referer) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host=~"$host"} | json |http_referer != "" [$__interval])))

topk(10, sum by (http_user_agent) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host=~"$host"} | json | http_user_agent !~ ".*bot.*" | http_user_agent !~ ".*crawler.*" | http_user_agent != "worldping-api" |  __error__="" [$__interval])))
sum by (status) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host=~"$host"} | json |  __error__="" [$__interval]))
sum by(host) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host=~"$host"}[$__interval]))
sum(rate({filename="$filename", host=~"$host"} | json | status >= 500 |__error__=""[$__interval])) / (sum(rate({filename="$filename", host=~"$host"} | json | __error__=""[$__interval])) / 100)
sum(rate(({job="$job", host="$host"} |= "Googlebot")[$__interval])) / (sum(rate(({job="$job", host="$host"} != "Googlebot")[$__interval])) / 100)
sum by (host) (sum_over_time({filename="$filename", host=~"$host"} | json | status=200 | unwrap body_bytes_sent |  __error__="" [$__interval]))
{filename="$filename", host=~"$host"} | json | line_format "[{{ .time_iso8601 }}] {{.remote_addr}} -> {{ .request_method }} {{.scheme}}://{{.http_host}}{{.request_uri}} - {{.status}}"
quantile_over_time(0.95,{filename="$filename", host=~"$host"} | json | unwrap request_time |  __error__=""  [$__interval]) by (host)
max by (host) (max_over_time({filename="$filename", host=~"$host"} | json | unwrap request_time |  __error__=""  [$__interval]))
sum by (status) (count_over_time({filename="$filename", host=~"$host"} | json |  __error__="" [$__interval]))
sum by (host) (sum_over_time({filename="$filename", host=~"$host"} | json | status=200 | unwrap body_bytes_sent |  __error__="" [$__interval]))

title: Nginx analytics
